overview:
Jeremiah, President & Founder of GroovyDo, is a creative young man with a successful entrepreneurial background in Internet startups. Born and raised in North Carolina, Johnson now resides primarily along the sunny Florida coastline.

With a natural aptitude as an innovative entrepreneur and creative inventor, he has founded and exited ten ventures successfully before thirty years of age, has multiple patents pending, attended Harvard Business School for Intellectual Property and Business Strategy, and while running his latest endeavors he is training for his pilotâ€™s license for rotorcraft.

Apart from being a highly ambitious, Jeremiah Johnson is a devoted partner, friend and businessman. He is an avid exotic car owner and enthusiast who enjoys traveling and spending time on the sunny Florida coastline. Of course, he never stops dreaming, creating and implementing the next startup.
